p: Aspergillus flavus was periodically subcultured in PDA slants at 4°C and cultivated on PDA medium at 28°C for 7 days before use. Then, the A. flavus was washed with sterile water, and the mycelium was removed by filtration with sterile cotton. The suspension concentration of spores was adjusted to 2 × 10 –7 cfu⋅mL –1 by counting on a hemocytometer.
